articles.author: Ian Carey
articles.title: First Endeavor bid for WWE made in mid-March, Liberty Media was ‘stiff competition’ - Figure Four Online
articles.description: Mark Shapiro spoke to Puck recently.
articles.content:
The deal for Endeavor to purchase WWE came together in just a few weeks.  
Endeavor president Mark Shapiro spoke with Puck recently and said he did not know the deal was going through until Saturday… [+1950 chars]
